Texts.Chs: 奇异之事的进一步细节...
Texts.Eng: Further details on the strange happenings...

Texts.Chs: 我们将麦克瑞迪禁闭于实验室内，他已不在是他，庆幸的是我们可以关闭密封门让他和那该死的生物见鬼去吧。我们觉得应该调查那个地方是否还会存在更多的那种生物，我得需要几个大型抓钩才能取得进展。
Texts.Eng: We've confined MacReady to the labs. He's totally lost it. At least we can seal the door remotely and he can be holed up with that...thing. We all decided that I should investigate beyond where I found the thing...see if there is anything more to this strangeness beyond the cliffs. I'll need a ^orange;grappling hook of some sort^white; to make any real progress.
